name: Anti-Hero IPA
description: Our flagship IPA features a blend of four hop varieties which creates a crisp bitterness and imparts massive floral and citrus aromas.

name: Freedom of Speech
description: A West Coast-style IPA with bright notes of grapefruit, pine, and tropical fruit.

name: Fist City
description: A Pale Ale that's hop-forward but balanced with a smooth malt character.
